metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.
The gallery category the workbook will appear under (e.g. workbook, sentinel, tsg).
The resource ID of the workspace this workbook will be associated with.
The unique guid for this workbook instance.

properties.serializedData: {"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"Please Note: Data in this workbook is updated hourly. Use the **SQL Action Group** and **Oracle Host Group** dropdowns to filter Oracle audit activity by category."},"name":"text - 3"}, ... ],"isLocked":false,"fallbackResourceIds":["/subscriptions/<SUBSCRIPTION-ID>/resourcegroups/<RESOURCE-GROUP>/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/<WORKSPACE-NAME>"],"fromTemplateId":"sentinel-UserWorkbook"}
